name: International Conference on Management and Economics
content: What are the emerging trends shaping the future of management and economics? Discover the latest insights and explore the hottest topics in the field at the International Conference on Management and Economics (ICMECONF), taking place in Manchester, UK from 18th to 20th October 2024\. This highly anticipated event brings together thought leaders, researchers, and practitioners to delve into the most pressing issues and innovative solutions in the realms of management and economics. Be part of the conversation as we collectively navigate the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead in these rapidly evolving disciplines.
